summary: Full-stack e-commerce platform for computer products with user authentication, shopping cart, checkout, order tracking, and secure Stripe payments
architectural_notes: Using Internet Identity for secure passkey-based user authentication
Stripe integration for secure online payment processing
Sample computer products pre-loaded in catalog
Basic order status workflow: Pending → Processing → Shipped → Delivered

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication system using Internet Identity allowing users to securely log in and maintain their session across the platform

Create product catalog system for computer products with categories, descriptions, pricing, and product images. Pre-populate with sample computer products including desktops, laptops, components, and peripherals
Implement shopping cart functionality allowing users to add products, update quantities, remove items, and view cart total. Cart must persist for logged-in users

Build checkout system with Stripe payment integration. Collect shipping address and contact information during checkout, process payment through Stripe, and create order record upon successful payment

Implement order tracking system showing order history for logged-in users with basic status progression: Pending, Processing, Shipped, Delivered. Each order displays products purchased, total amount, order date, and current status

Design a cohesive visual theme using warm earth tones with terracotta accents and clean modern typography. Apply consistent styling across all pages including product cards, cart, checkout, and order tracking interfaces
